history.proof: intros A l. induction l as [|x xs IHxs]. - apply nil_is_permutation. - hauto lq: on depth: 3use: is_permutation_sind, cons_is_permutation.

original: intros A l. induction l as [|x xs IHxs]. - apply nil_is_permutation. - apply is_permutation_sind with (l := x :: l) (l0 := x :: l). + apply cons_is_permutation. apply IHxs. + apply IHxs.
